explanation: [0-0] The video begins near the goal line of a football field, where a white van is parked on the goal line. Above the picture are avatars and nationalities of several players. The background is a white stand. There is a "@svshd" caption on the football in front of the camera.

[0-5] Quaresma, wearing a black tracksuit, runs in from the right side of the screen and prepares to shoot. Quaresma shoots, the ball hits the van and bounces off. Quaresma shoots again, this time the ball flies high over the van and finally kicks into the train accurately. A green check mark appears above Quaresma's avatar.
